unnormalised: Hey! Athlete bios are my favorite. I just read Sachin Tendulkar's, amazing stuff! Remember that Chak De! India movie? These real life stories are even more inspiring. I also liked reading about PT Usha's struggles and wins from the SAI (Sports Authority of India). Gotta appreciate the dedication it takes, from small town to national glory. Respect to these athletes! More power to them! Jai Hind!
